General.Name: Nantong JiangTian Chemical Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Nantong JiangTian Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China and internationally. It primarily offers paraformaldehyde; formaldehyde; methyl chloride; ethylene glycol hemiacetal; 1,3,5-triacryloylhexahydro-1,3,5-triazine; and other chemical products. Nantong JiangTian Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Nantong, China.
